Method Detail

run

public void run()
Main loop of the SMTP server. Accept connection and use a ClientThread for each one.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

selectClient

public StreamedSMTPPostfixInputConnector.ClientThread selectClient()
Select a ClientThread in clientPool. If the pool is empty, creates a new thread and return it. Else if one the thread is free, return it. Else creates a new thread and return it.

Returns:
the selected ClientThread

isStopped

public boolean isStopped()
Check if the server has been placed in a stopped state. Allows another thread to stop the server safely.

Returns:
true if the server has been sent a stop signal, false otherwise.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
              throws java.io.IOException
Stops the server. Server is shutdown after processing of the current request is complete.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
